definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: He abbreviated so much that it was hard to understand his article.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章縮寫詞使用太多，令人費解。

sentences.english: This book is a little past the pupil.
sentences.chinese: 這本書對小學生還有點費解。

sentences.english: When encoding video, you typically encounter a lot of perplexing terminology.
sentences.chinese: 編碼一個視頻時，您通常會遇到很多令人費解的術語。

sentences.english: It’s just a bunch of gobbledygook symbols.
sentences.chinese: 它只是一堆令人費解的符號。

sentences.english: A week before I was supposed to leave, our conversations become inexplicably terse.
sentences.chinese: 我要出發的前一週，我們的對話變得費解的簡潔。

sentences.english: First of all, never underestimate the impenetrability of the presidential bubble.
sentences.chinese: 首先，永遠不要低估總統泡沫費解。

sentences.english: Technology keeps baffling and inundating us with its jargon .
sentences.chinese: 技術不斷令人費解和淹沒，我們與它的行話。

sentences.english: Anyone unsettled by reen's role should look deeper.
sentences.chinese: 對格林的角色感到費解的人應該看得更深些。

sentences.english: The official reasoning for no capacitive touchscreen support is puzzling. Here's what Prithvi Raj, Windows Mobile product manager of consumer experiences told us
sentences.chinese: 官方對不支持電容屏所做的解釋令人費解。

sentences.english: It beats me how he got the job.
sentences.chinese: 令我費解的是他怎麼找到了工作。

sentences.english: So the FPDA's survival seems puzzling.
sentences.chinese: 所以《五國國防協議》的存在似乎令人費解。

sentences.english: What’s not so obvious is why people leak confidential material. We have yet to hear from Pfc.
sentences.chinese: 讓人費解的是人們爲何要泄露機密材料。

sentences.english: Their reason for doing it is still a puzzle to me.
sentences.chinese: 他們幹那件事的動機仍令我費解。

sentences.english: This is the kind of perplexing thought Descartes forces us to confront.
sentences.chinese: 這正是笛卡爾迫使我們面對的那種令人費解的想法。

sentences.english: She often had trouble comprehending them.

definition: to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
silly talk or "mo lei tau" (Cantonese), genre of humor emerging from Hong Kong late in the 20th century
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
